contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} '''Luxor''' was a [[Sweden|Swedish]] home electronics and computer manufacturer located in [[Motala]], acquired by [[Nokia]] in 1985. Originally a manufacturer of [[tape recorder]]s, radios, [[television]] sets, [[stereo]] systems, and other home electronics, it launched its first [[home computer]], the [[ABC 80]] in 1978. The succeeding [[ABC 800]] series was introduced in 1981 with new releases in 1983 being produced until the ABC line was terminated in 1986. ==See also== *[[List of Swedish companies]] {{DEFAULTSORT:Luxor Ab}} [[Category:Defunct companies of Sweden]]
